using namespace std;

inline void ip( ll &x) {
	    register  ll c = gc();
	    x = 0;
	    for(; ((c<48 || c>57) ); c = gc());
	    for(; c>47 && c<58 ; c = gc()) {
	        x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;
	    }

	}
/*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

int main()
{
    ll t;
    ip(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        ll n,d,ans=0,i,x;
        ip(n);ip(d);
        vector<ll>v;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {

            ip(x);
            v.pb(x);
        }
        sort(v.begin(),v.end());
        x= n-d;
        for(i=0;i<x;i++)
            ans+=v[i];
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
}
